meanings.definition: The act of providing furniture, especially seats, with padding, springs, webbing, and fabric or leather covers.
meanings.sent1: The upholstering of the sofa made it much more comfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of upholstering from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the upholstering of the armchair was a perfect spot for a nap.
meanings.sent4: His words were like the skilled hands of an upholstering artist, carefully crafting each sentence.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the upholstering brought life to the old chair.

meanings.definition: The craft or business of upholstering furniture.
meanings.sent1: His family has been in the upholstering business for generations.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in upholstering after taking a class in high school.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best upholstering design was fierce but friendly.
meanings.sent4: The art of upholstering is a blend of creativity and precision.
meanings.sent5: The upholstering shop was filled with the scent of fresh fabric and leather.
